example.name: autogen1
example.text: Congress 's eagerness to reward Poland and Hungary for their moves toward democracy and freemarket economic reforms
example.arg: to reward Poland and Hungary for their moves toward democracy and freemarket economic reforms

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Coke 's eagerness to have a hand in developing the soft-drink markets in Pacific Basin countries
